Text:
@ Sir SaM

If you have GANDU ( a bengali shockumentary film ) please upload it !
i find only 26 mb trailer version, & many thanks for Hereafter !

V-8
A-7.... 2 if you speak english
M-2.... 6 if you enjoy a big juicy dick in your mouth!

 Save yourself, and get another movie to download!! Honestly the worst flick I have seen in months!
Thanks a lot, the film is great !
I agree with masterangler, if you speak english don't bother downloading, unless you want to add subtitles...

I didn't follow the advice not to download this version because of non-English audio all because it says here that the spoken language is in English.   The truth is that SOME is in English. All the scenes in France are in French with no subs. So you have to understand both languages which I think would not be Mr Eastwood's idea and not appeal to a broad audiance.  If you understand only English - chose another version.  I found a good one with English sub on the French dialog.
